class.name: NavigationPolygon
class.brief_description: A node that has methods to draw outlines or use indices of vertices to create navigation polygons.
class.description: There are two ways to create polygons. Either by using the [method add_outline] method, or using the [method add_polygon] method. Using [method add_outline]: [codeblock] var polygon = NavigationPolygon.new() var outline = PoolVector2Array([Vector2(0, 0), Vector2(0, 50), Vector2(50, 50), Vector2(50, 0)]) polygon.add_outline(outline) polygon.make_polygons_from_outlines() $NavigationPolygonInstance.navpoly = polygon [/codeblock] Using [method add_polygon] and indices of the vertices array. [codeblock] var polygon = NavigationPolygon.new() var vertices = PoolVector2Array([Vector2(0, 0), Vector2(0, 50), Vector2(50, 50), Vector2(50, 0)]) polygon.set_vertices(vertices) var indices = PoolIntArray(0, 3, 1) polygon.add_polygon(indices) $NavigationPolygonInstance.navpoly = polygon [/codeblock]

method.name: add_outline
method.description: Appends a [PoolVector2Array] that contains the vertices of an outline to the internal array that contains all the outlines. You have to call [method make_polygons_from_outlines] in order for this array to be converted to polygons that the engine will use.

method.name: add_outline_at_index
method.description: Adds a [PoolVector2Array] that contains the vertices of an outline to the internal array that contains all the outlines at a fixed position. You have to call [method make_polygons_from_outlines] in order for this array to be converted to polygons that the engine will use.

method.name: add_polygon
method.description: Adds a polygon using the indices of the vertices you get when calling [method get_vertices].

method.name: clear_outlines
method.description: Clears the array of the outlines, but it doesn't clear the vertices and the polygons that were created by them.

method.name: clear_polygons
method.description: Clears the array of polygons, but it doesn't clear the array of outlines and vertices.

method.name: get_outline
method.description: Returns a [PoolVector2Array] containing the vertices of an outline that was created in the editor or by script.

method.name: get_outline_count
method.description: Returns the number of outlines that were created in the editor or by script.

method.name: get_polygon
method.description: Returns a [PoolIntArray] containing the indices of the vertices of a created polygon.

method.name: get_polygon_count
method.description: Returns the count of all polygons.

method.name: get_vertices
method.description: Returns a [PoolVector2Array] containing all the vertices being used to create the polygons.

method.name: make_polygons_from_outlines
method.description: Creates polygons from the outlines added in the editor or by script.

method.name: remove_outline
method.description: Removes an outline created in the editor or by script. You have to call [method make_polygons_from_outlines] for the polygons to update.

method.name: set_outline
method.description: Changes an outline created in the editor or by script. You have to call [method make_polygons_from_outlines] for the polygons to update.

method.name: set_vertices
method.description: Sets the vertices that can be then indexed to create polygons with the [method add_polygon] method.
